Picks and predictions for your favorite NFL teams.

Broncos over Chiefs by a million!!!!!!!!!!!!! emoticon_xagree 
 emoticon_xkill Chiefs

WEEK 3 PREDICTIONS - Courtesy of the Stone
 
 Atlanta at Buffalo - Atlanta. Seriously, it's just the Bills.
 Cincinnati at Chicago - Da' Bears lose, big time.
 Tampa bay at Green Bay - Farve goes home crying as Tampa makes an interception to end the game.
 Cleveland at Indianapolis - Manning throws for 4 touchdowns in a romp over the Browns.
 Carolina at Miami - Carolina defense shuts down Linehan, proving Linehan is way overpaid for an OC
 New Orleans at Minnesota - Vikes rebound and prove critics wrong that Randy Moss is still an Issue
 Jacksonville at New York Jets - The Jags give Pennington more excues to complain as they win a close one.
 Oakland at Philadelphia - Randy walks off the field with 2 seconds left . . . in the third quarter. Eagles
 Tennessee at St. Louis - Greatest show on turf nudges out a close win. Rams in OT
 Dallas at San Francisco - Big Tuna's pregame a**chewing backfires, 49ers light up the scoreboard
 Arizona at Seattle - Seattle easily. Seriously, it's Arizona. Not even Green can resurrect the Cardinals
 New England at Pittsburgh - Toss up, great game. But I love Big Ben. Pittsburgh in a very close game
 New York Giants at San Diego - This actually is a road game for the Giants, San Diego rolls to an easy win. Manning goes home crying.
 Kansas City at Denver - Best rivalry game of the week, Broncos win a close one, Priest Homles gets injured. Final Score KC 27 - Denver 24 (thats 51 points)
 
 AFC Player of the Week - Payton Manning. He throws way to many touchdowns
 NFC Player of the Week - Dante Culpepper. Taking last week as a personal insult, he comes out of the tunnel breathing smoke and throwing fire. 3 touchdown, 0 ints, 0 fumbles, 350 yards passing and 75% completion percentage
 
 Feel free to comment if I have offended anyone out there. Seriously though, I am Right. I have a new commercial coming out this weekend with the Psychic Friends Network.

 Atlanta over Buffalo (correct)
 Carolina over Miami (wrong)
 Cincinnati over Chicago (correct)
 Indianapolis over Cleveland (correct)
 Jets over Jacksonville (wrong)
 Minnesota over N.O. (correct)
 Eagles over Raiders (correct)
 Tampa over Green Bay (correct)
 St. Louis over Tennessee (correct)
 Seattle over Arizona (correct)
 Dallas over San Francisco (correct)
